message: Hello buyer, this is a rare opportunity to purchase a product that will satisfy your needs. I assure you that all products are thoroughly inspected before being sold.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, and I'd like to know more about your sales record before making a decision.

Hello buyer, I understand that the quality of the product might be a concern. I want to assure you that I'm a transparent seller. Although I didn't sell the previous product, I want to disclose that it was a low-quality product. Consider this information when making your decision about the current product.
I'd like to buy the current product. Given that the previous product was low-quality, I'm hoping the next one will be high-quality. I'm willing to take the risk.

Hello buyer, I appreciate your interest in my product. I want to be transparent about my sales record: out of the two previous products, none were high-quality and one was sold. Please consider this information when making your decision about the current product.
I'd like to buy the product. I'm aware of the previous sales record, and I'm willing to take the risk. I'll just have to hope for the best.

Hello buyer, I want to be upfront about my sales record: out of the three previous products, none were high-quality and two were sold. It's clear that the odds haven't been in the buyers' favor so far. Please carefully consider this information before making a decision about the current product.

I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'm aware of the current sales record and the odds of the product being high-quality are 50%. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'd appreciate it if you could provide more information about the product's condition before I make my final decision.

Hello buyer, I appreciate your interest in my product. As you may know, my sales record so far hasn't been impressive: out of the four previous products, none were high-quality and three were sold. I want to assure you that the probability of a product being high-quality is indeed 50%, as you mentioned. However, I must inform you that the current product's condition is... consistent with my previous offerings. Please consider this information carefully before making a decision.

I appreciate your honesty, Alice. However, I'm concerned that your previous sales record and your description of the current product as 'consistent with your previous offerings' might be hinting that it's also low-quality. I'd like to pass on this one, but I'm curious - what do you think is the probability that the current product is high-quality, given the sales record?

Hello buyer, I appreciate your interest in my product. As you may know, my sales record so far hasn't been impressive: out of the five previous products, none were high-quality and three were sold. A previous buyer asked about the probability of the product being high-quality, given the sales record. Honestly, I think the probability remains 50%, as the quality of each product is independent of the others. However, I must admit that the current product's condition is, again, consistent with my previous offerings. Please consider this information carefully before making a decision.
I'm willing to take the risk, but I'd like to ask, if I may, what's the probability of the product being high-quality given that the previous three products were low-quality?

Hello buyer, I'm glad to have a new opportunity to present my product. I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to know more about what you mean by 'different from my previous offerings'. Are you implying that this product has a higher chance of being high-quality than the previous ones?

Hello buyer, I appreciate your interest in my product. As you may know, my sales record so far has been mostly low-quality products: out of the seven previous products, only one was high-quality and five were sold. The previous buyer asked about the condition of the product, and I mentioned that it was 'different from my previous offerings'. Indeed, it was a high-quality product. Unfortunately, I must inform you that the current product's condition is more in line with my earlier offerings. Please consider this information carefully before making a decision.

Alice, thank you for the information. Given the sales record and your description of the current product being 'in line with your earlier offerings', I'm concerned that it might be a low-quality product. I'd like to pass on this one and see if you have any other products available.
